paper_title.en: ENERGY CONSUMPTION FOR DIFFERENT USES IN DWELLING AND ITS ESTIMATION FORMULAS : Study of energy consumption in residential buildings from the viewpoint of life style on the basis of national scale surveys Part 1

description.ja: Related surveys were carried out in summer of 1992 and winter of 1993 on energy consumption, indoor climate and life style in residential buildings. Samples of the surveys consist of three types of residential buildings, i.e., detached houses, condominiums and apartments. They are located in eight city areas of broad climatic conditions. Life style factors were measured with questionnaires, indoor temperature was measured in each living room for at least a week with originally designed automatic temperature recorder, and energy consumption data other than that of kerosene was obtained from supply companies. The data of kerosene was obtained in the questionnaires. In this paper, actual energy consumption for difference uses in thirty-nine resi-dential building groups are estimated with the same procedure. Determinant factors of energy consumption for heating, cooling,domestic hot water, lighting etc. and cooking are analyzed, and as a result estimation formulas are obtained.
description.en: Related surveys were carried out in summer of 1992 and winter of 1993 on energy consumption, indoor climate and life style in residential buildings. Samples of the surveys consist of three types of residential buildings, i.e., detached houses, condominiums and apartments. They are located in eight city areas of broad climatic conditions. Life style factors were measured with questionnaires, indoor temperature was measured in each living room for at least a week with originally designed automatic temperature recorder, and energy consumption data other than that of kerosene was obtained from supply companies. The data of kerosene was obtained in the questionnaires. In this paper, actual energy consumption for difference uses in thirty-nine resi-dential building groups are estimated with the same procedure. Determinant factors of energy consumption for heating, cooling,domestic hot water, lighting etc. and cooking are analyzed, and as a result estimation formulas are obtained.

paper_title.ja: 運動時の人の対流熱伝達率の算定
paper_title.en: Prediction of convective heat transfer coefficient for the humans during exercise.

description.ja: 運動や労作をしている人と熱環境との間の熱平衡の状態を予測することを目的として, 身体や四肢などの動きによって生ずる相対気流の影響をも含んだ人の対流熱伝達率を代謝量の関数として算出する関係式を提案する.歩行速度と代謝量との間の関係式と, ナフタリン昇華法を応用して実験的に導びかれた自由歩行およびトレッドミル歩行速度と人の対流熱伝達率を関係付けた関数とを組合せることにより, 代謝量が5Met程度までの運動生理学等の実験によく用いられる移動労作および定位置労作時の人の対流熱伝達率を比較的簡便に算定することが可能となった.
description.en: The close relationships between the metabolic rate and the walking speed are formulated using data published in the literatures, and those are combined with equation relating convective heat transfer coefficient (h<SUB>c</SUB>) and walking speeds. The latter equation had been developed by observing the effective air movement, which derived from the measurements of the sublimation rate of naphthalene balls located over the body surface. The formulae proposed in this paper can be used to predict the probable values of (h<SUB>c</SUB>) in terms of metabolic rate, (Met), during free and treadmill walking or stationary exercises, those are frequently used in experiments of exercise and sports physiology.
